name: Remote Control Stunt Car
description: High-speed 4WD car that can flip, spin 360 degrees, and drive on both sides. High-frequency 2.4GHz remote.

name: Educational Robot Kit
description: Hands-on STEM kit to build and program your own robot. Teaches basic coding and mechanical engineering.

name: Giant Solar System Floor Puzzle
description: 48-piece extra-large puzzle with detailed illustrations of planets and stars. Educational and fun.

name: Electronic Drum Pad Set
description: Portable roll-up drum kit with built-in speakers and record function. Perfect for aspiring musicians.

name: Magical Glow-in-the-Dark Fort Kit
description: 80-piece construction set for building custom forts and playhouses. Rods glow in the dark.

name: DIY Crystal Growing Kit
description: Complete lab to grow stunning colorful crystals in just a few days. Includes display stands.

name: Advanced Wooden Marble Run
description: Huge 150-piece set with twists, turns, and elevators. Made from eco-friendly wood.

name: Kids Waterproof Action Camera
description: 1080p camera with a protective case for underwater filming. Perfect for bikes and swimming.

name: 3D Magnetic Building Tiles
description: 100-piece set of colorful translucent tiles. Encourages spatial reasoning and architectural design.

name: Professional Kids Microscope
description: Real microscope with up to 1200x magnification. Includes slides, tools, and a carrying case.

name: Digital Walkie Talkies for Kids
description: Long-range crystal-clear communication for outdoor adventures. Features 22 channels and a flashlight.

name: Inflatable Giant Bowling Set
description: Oversized pins and ball for backyard fun. Durable PVC material, easy to inflate.

name: Art Supply Deluxe Wood Case
description: 150-piece set including paints, markers, crayons, and pastels in a professional wooden case.

name: Interactive Storytelling Owl
description: Plush owl that tells over 20 stories and sings bedtime songs. Eyes move and change color.

name: Kids Baking & Cooking Kit
description: Real tools for young chefs: apron, hat, rolling pin, and recipe book. Food-grade materials.

name: Remote Control Flying Drone
description: Beginner-friendly drone with altitude hold and one-key takeoff. Includes extra batteries.

name: Tabletop Air Hockey Game
description: Compact version of the arcade classic with powerful air flow. Fits on any dining table.

name: Detective & Spy Investigation Kit
description: Tools for solving mysteries: fingerprint powder, invisible ink, and rear-view glasses.

name: Multi-Color Light-Up Pogo Jumper
description: Safe foam pogo stick for toddlers. Squeaks with every jump and flashes bright colors.

name: Eco-Friendly Sand & Water Table
description: Made from recycled ocean plastic. Includes funnels, wheels, and scoops for outdoor sensory play.

name: Kids Telescope with Tripod
description: Astronomy for beginners. Includes multi-magnification eyepieces for viewing the moon and stars.

name: Electronic Cash Register Playset
description: Working calculator with a real scanner and credit card swiper. Teaches basic math and money handlings.

name: Kids Digital Drawing Tablet
description: Pressure-sensitive screen that feels like drawing on paper. Save and export work to a computer.

name: Soft Foam Archery Set
description: Safe bow and arrow kit with suction cup tips. Features an LED target for indoor practice.

name: Animal Kingdom Play Mat
description: Large detailed map with 12 high-quality animal figures. Perfect for imaginative storytelling.

name: Kids Gardening & Nature Kit
description: Includes real seeds, soil, pots, and a field guide for identifying local birds and insects.

name: Luminescent Sea Monkey Lab
description: Watch tiny aquatic creatures hatch and grow in a specialized tank with built-in magnifying lenses.

name: Dinosaur Fossil Dig Kit
description: Authentic-feeling excavation block with tools to reveal a T-Rex skeleton model.

name: Kids Reusable Sticker Pad
description: Large format pads with hundreds of cling stickers. Endless creative possibilities without the mess.

name: Interactive Talking Globe
description: Smart globe that provides facts about countries, animals, and cultures when touched with the pen.

name: Kids Weighted Lap Pad
description: Soothing sensory tool for children who need help focusing. Features soft plush fabric and cool patterns.

name: Flexible Car Track Set
description: Racetrack that can be bent and twisted to create complex courses. Pulse-charging cars included.

name: Kids Bubble Blower Machine
description: Automatic machine that generates thousands of bubbles per minute. Perfect for outdoor parties.

name: Marble Run with LED Lights
description: Futuristic building set with translucent tubes and flashing marbles. Incredible at night.

name: Inflatable Hopper Ball
description: Classic bouncing ball with a sturdy handle. Encourages exercise and improves coordination.

name: Musical Dancing Robot
description: Toy robot that dances and moves to its own music. Features a light projector on its chest.

name: Kids Adventure Binoculars
description: Real optics with a comfortable rubberized grip. Includes a compass and a protective neck strap.

name: DIY Tie-Dye Creation Kit
description: Includes 12 vibrant colors and accessories to create custom shirts and bags. Non-toxic dyes.

name: Advanced Jigsaw Puzzle 1000pc
description: Challenging puzzle for older kids and adults. Features high-definition imagery and perfect-fit pieces.

name: Kids Indoor Zip Line
description: Safe and fun indoor zip line that attaches to sturdy doors or ceiling hooks. High-weight capacity seat.
